description: List release notes with filtering and pagination
permissions: Anonymous users can list only published release notes with released_on on or before the current date; non-admin users can list published release notes matching their membership scopes or custom user scopes; admins can list all release notes.
validation_notes: Filters are combined with AND logic. is-published, is-archived, and has-navigation-instructions-guess require true/false values; is-archived defaults to false. released-on-min and released-on-max must be valid dates in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flags.name: --created-by
flags.description: Filter by creator user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --has-navigation-instructions-guess
flags.description: Filter by having navigation instructions guess (true/false)

flags.name: --is-archived
flags.description: Filter by archived status (true/false, default: false)

flags.name: --released-on-max
flags.description: Filter to release notes released on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --released-on-min
flags.description: Filter to release notes released on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
